extendedInfo.description: This is the OFFICIAL application of Ole Miss created by the CBSSports.com College Network, in partnership with the University. This exclusive sports application offers LIVE STREAMED games:************************************************************LIVE VIDEO* & AUDIO*- Upgrade in the application to stream select games************************************************************* Audio and video are only available on certain compatible Android devices running OS2.2 or later. This device has not been tested for video compatibility. In order to access the audio or video please install the Sports Media Player in Google Play and re-launch this application.Annual Subscription $9.99ADDITIONAL APPLICATION FEATURES-	Live Scoring-	Play-by-Play-	Complete Sport Schedules-	Exclusive breaking sports news-	Video on demand-	Alerts (game start and final scores)-	Team and Coaches Rosters & Bios-	 Much moreâ¦COVERS ALL SCHOOL SPORTS!

reviews.title: No radio, no good, sorry = 1
reviews.comment: Nice quick reference, to get the latest on the Rebs. But, having to go elsewhere for radio is not good, should be able to get games here. smh !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Great video footage. Love that you put full games on there! Any way you can make the footage full screen?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good, for the money!
reviews.comment: Not worth the money if you were wanting to listen to the games.

reviews.comment: Love the update no more FC issues. Just in time! Thanks!!!!!

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Please change it back to simply saying \'Ole miss\' under the app logo. Now it says \'Ole miss sports\' and it all doesn\'t fit, and looks tacky

reviews.title: Great update!
reviews.comment: The old app used to vibrate every 5 seconds. Now the app is great!!
